testcase.name: Navigate to the login page from the main page
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia main page.......................................passed When I click the Login link in the header...................................passed Then I should be on the Wikipedia Login page................................passed And I should see the Username field.........................................passed And I should see the Password field.........................................passed And I should see the Login button...........................................passed

testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia Login page......................................passed When I enter the valid username.............................................passed And I enter the valid password..............................................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should be logged in successfully.....................................passed

testcase.name: "Keep me logged in" checkbox functionality
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia Login page......................................passed When I check the "Keep me logged in" checkbox...............................passed Then the "Keep me logged in" checkbox should be selected....................passed And When I uncheck the "Keep me logged in" checkbox.........................passed Then the "Keep me logged in" checkbox should not be selected................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login attempts with invalid credentials - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia Login page......................................passed When I enter "SeleniumT3stUser" in the Username field.......................passed And I enter "Inc0rrectPass" in the Password field...........................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message "Incorrect username or password entered. Please try again.".passed And I should still be on the Wikipedia Login page...........................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login attempts with invalid credentials - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia Login page......................................passed When I enter "N0nExistentUser123" in the Username field.....................passed And I enter "AnyP4ssw0rd" in the Password field.............................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should see an error message "Incorrect username or password entered. Please try again.".passed And I should still be on the Wikipedia Login page...........................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login attempts with empty fields for HTML5 validation erros - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia Login page......................................passed When I leave the "Username" field empty.....................................passed And I enter "AnyPassword" in the "Password" field...........................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should see a browser validation message for the "Username" field.....passed And I should still be on the Wikipedia Login page...........................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login attempts with empty fields for HTML5 validation erros - #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I am on the Wikipedia Login page......................................passed When I leave the "Password" field empty.....................................passed And I enter "SeleniumTestUser" in the "Username" field......................passed And I click the Login button................................................passed Then I should see a browser validation message for the "Password" field.....passed And I should still be on the Wikipedia Login page...........................passed
